search_context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

results.title: Report a missed bin

Key Strengths: Direct link to the page offering an online form to report a missed bin collection
Recommendations.Reasoning: The provided snippet mentions 'You can report the missed collection using our online form below.', indicating that this is the most relevant option for reporting a missed bin.

Recommendations.Title: Disruptions to bin collections

Recommendations.Title: Bins, rubbish and recycling

Recommendations.Title: Report a spilled bin
